verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh-ooh,
Lord, O-ur
Lord. How,
excellent is your
name, Your name is
strength, your name is
power. A strong
to-wer, makes me
safe... (And we're crying...)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ooh oh oh, Nobody like
you Lord, Nobody like
you Lord

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Like you lord, there's nobody
like you Lord, there's nobody
